definition: exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)

sentences.english: This report name must be unique compared with previous reports you have run and archived.
sentences.chinese: 該報表名應該與您以前所運行並存檔的報表名不同。

sentences.english: This report name must be unique compared with previous reports you have run and archived.
sentences.chinese: 該報表名應該與您以前所運行並存檔的報表名不同。

sentences.english: This section will give you a brief overview of how the sorting capabilities that were put into the report work.
sentences.chinese: 本節概述投入報表工作中的排序功能的工作方式。

sentences.english: In the first article, my goal was to obtain printable reports.
sentences.chinese: 在第一篇文章中，我的目的是得到可打印報表。

sentences.english: The Viewer navigation bar is used when displaying a multi-page report.
sentences.chinese: 當顯示一個多頁的報表時我們將使用查看器導航條。

sentences.english: These tax forms are driving me nuts .
sentences.chinese: 填這些納稅申報表快讓我發瘋了。

sentences.english: It also should publicize the notes explaining those financial statements.
sentences.chinese: 還應該公開這些財務報表的說明。

sentences.english: Didn't you hear what I said before? I really gotta finish these offerings.
sentences.chinese: 你剛沒聽到我說嗎？我真得弄完這些報表。

sentences.english: A monthly report on an individuals account activity at the bank they have an account(s) with.
sentences.chinese: 銀行爲開戶個人提供其帳戶活動情況的月報表。

sentences.english: If a Daywork Schedule is not included in the Contract, this Sub -Clause shall not apply.
sentences.chinese: 如果合同中沒有計日工報表，則本款不適用。

sentences.english: Could you please send us your company brochure and your latest annual report?
sentences.chinese: 能寄來貴公司宣傳手冊及最新年度報表嗎？

sentences.english: David, can you find the 1993 sales report for me?
sentences.chinese: 大衛，你能幫我找一下1993年的銷售報表嗎？

sentences.english: Manages data source connections and runs report requests.
sentences.chinese: 管理數據源連接和運行報表請求。

sentences.english: According to the regulations, the financial reports of all the domestic enterprises have to be kept with Renminbi as the standard accounting unit.
sentences.chinese: 內的企業所有的財務報表都要以人民幣爲記帳本位幣。

sentences.english: You should receive account statements from a third-party custodian.
sentences.chinese: 你應該會收到來自第三方託管人的帳戶報表。

sentences.english: The toolbar also supplies an icon to re-run the existing report.
sentences.chinese: 工具欄也提供了一個圖標來重新運行現存的報表。

definition: to verify accounting records/also written 對帳|对帐[dui4 zhang4]
responsible for its profit and losses (of organization)/financially autonomous/personal financial responsibility
